CompositePictogram.title: CompositePictogram
CompositePictogram.description: A composite pictogram representing a diagrammatic schema in association with an embedded regular sign.

pictogramDescription.title: pictogramDescription
pictogramDescription.description: Description of the  displayed composed pictogram.

CompositePictogramEnum.title: CompositePictogramEnum
CompositePictogramEnum.description: Identifies a pictogram used only for building a composite pictogram

DedicatedUsageEnum.title: DedicatedUsageEnum
DedicatedUsageEnum.description: Type of usage for which a VMS is dedicated

DisplayArea.title: DisplayArea
DisplayArea.description: Configuration (static or dynamic) of a display area.

sequencingCapable.title: sequencingCapable
sequencingCapable.description: Indicates whether the display area on the VMS is capable of sequencing through multiple pages. True = capable.

maxNumberOfSequentialPages.title: maxNumberOfSequentialPages
maxNumberOfSequentialPages.description: Maximum number of pages which the VMS is capable of scrolling through sequentially (2 to n).

positionXAbsolute.title: positionXAbsolute
positionXAbsolute.description: The horizontal position of the area in which the pictogram is displayed, i.e. at the left, or right of the VMS display.

positionXRelativeToPrevious.title: positionXRelativeToPrevious
positionXRelativeToPrevious.description: The horizontal position of the area in which the pictogram is displayed relative to the previous display in the collection (e.g. to the left, to the right ....).

positionYAbsolute.title: positionYAbsolute
positionYAbsolute.description: The vertical position of the area in which the area is displayed, i.e. at the top or bottom of the VMS display.

positionYRelativeToPrevious.title: positionYRelativeToPrevious
positionYRelativeToPrevious.description: The horizontal position of the area in which the pictogram is displayed relative to the previous display area in the collection (i.e.above or below).

overriddenLaneAssociation.title: overriddenLaneAssociation
overriddenLaneAssociation.description: The display area is associated with these lanes, which refine any location specified for the VMS

DisplayAreaSettings.title: DisplayAreaSettings
DisplayAreaSettings.description: A display of pictograms or text on one area on a VMS.

isBlank.title: isBlank
isBlank.description: Identifies whether this display area is blank. The absense of this attribute has no semantics.

legallyBinding.title: legallyBinding
legallyBinding.description: The semantics of this display are legally binding for road users

legalBasis.title: legalBasis
legalBasis.description: Identies any legal basis for the elements displayed

DisplayedNumericalInformation.title: DisplayedNumericalInformation
DisplayedNumericalInformation.description: Numerical information displayed on a sign

numericValue.title: numericValue
numericValue.description: The value displayed. In the special case where the unit of measure is feet and inches, the part of the number after the decimal separator is the number of inches.

unitOfMeasure.title: unitOfMeasure
unitOfMeasure.description: The unit of measure for the numeric value. This may be displayed or predefined for a type of sign.

DisplayGeometry.title: DisplayGeometry
DisplayGeometry.description: Characteristics of the geometry of a display

pixelsAcross.title: pixelsAcross
pixelsAcross.description: Number of pixels horizontally across the display area.

pixelsDown.title: pixelsDown
pixelsDown.description: Number of pixels vertically down the display area.

displayHeight.title: displayHeight
displayHeight.description: The vertical height measured in metres of the display area.

displayWidth.title: displayWidth
displayWidth.description: The horizontal width measured in metres of the display area.

positionX.title: positionX
positionX.description: The X-coordinate (horizontal) position of this specific display area measured from the top left of the sign's overall display area to the top left of this specific display area

positionY.title: positionY
positionY.description: The Y-coordinate (vertical) position of this specific display area measured from the top left of the sign's overall display area to the top left of this specific display area

GddPictogramAttributes.title: GddPictogramAttributes
GddPictogramAttributes.description: ISO 14823 Graphic Data Dictionary attributes with textual or numeric data to supplement a pictogram identification.

attributes.title: attributes
attributes.description: ISO 14823 "attributes" data frame which augments the basic identification of the type of pictogram with further textual or numeric data. The encoding shall follow unaligned packed encoding rules (UPER) [ISO/IEC 8825-2:2015]

GddPictogramCategoryCode.title: GddPictogramCategoryCode
GddPictogramCategoryCode.description: A 3-digit code to identify a pictogram, as defined in ISO 14823 Graphic Data Dictionary. That standard is inconsistent in its definition of the value range; this model uses the more permissive definition where the bounds are 100 and 999.

GddPictogramIdentification.title: GddPictogramIdentification
GddPictogramIdentification.description: Group of codes that uniquely identifies a kind of pictogram, according to the ISO 14823 Graphic Data Dictionary

country.title: country
country.description: Country code used to either allow associating a country-specific rendering with the coded pictogram or distinguish nationally-defined pictogram codes.

serviceCategory.title: serviceCategory
serviceCategory.description: Category used to group pictograms for a given usage

pictogramCategoryCode.title: pictogramCategoryCode
pictogramCategoryCode.description: Code that identifies a pictogram for a given country and service category.

GddServiceCategoryEnum.title: GddServiceCategoryEnum
GddServiceCategoryEnum.description: Type of service offered by the pictogram, as defined in ISO 14823 Graphic Data Dictionary (GDD)

GddStructure.title: GddStructure
GddStructure.description: Graphic Data Dictionary structure, to identify a pictogram by code and optional supplementary attributes

Image.title: Image
Image.description: An image, with encoded data and identification of format

imageFormat.title: imageFormat
imageFormat.description: Identifies the image format of the associated image data

ManagedLogicalLocation.title: ManagedLogicalLocation
ManagedLogicalLocation.description: The logical location (e.g. a car park, a section of road, a junction etc.) which a VMS contributes to the management of.

managedLogicalLocation.title: managedLogicalLocation
managedLogicalLocation.description: Identification of the logical location (e.g. a car park, a section of road , a junction etc.) which this sign contributes to the management of.

distanceFromLogicalLocation.title: distanceFromLogicalLocation
distanceFromLogicalLocation.description: Distance in metres of the VMS from the logical location which this sign contributes to the management of.

managedLocation.title: managedLocation
managedLocation.description: The location which is managed by the variable message sign, such as the location of a junction or a car park.

MessageInformationTypeEnum.title: MessageInformationTypeEnum
MessageInformationTypeEnum.description: Types of information displayable on a VMS.

MultiPageDisplay.title: MultiPageDisplay
MultiPageDisplay.description: A display of multiple pages, sequentially displayed in order of their "pageNumber".

sequenceGroupNumber.title: sequenceGroupNumber
sequenceGroupNumber.description: Where MultiPageDisplay instances have the same sequenceGroupNumber, the timed progression through their pages is synchronised.

PhysicalSupportEnum.title: PhysicalSupportEnum
PhysicalSupportEnum.description: The ways in which equipments such as VMS are mounted or deployed on the road.

Pictogram.title: Pictogram
Pictogram.description: A main pictogram displayable on the VMS panel. Note a main pictogram may have an associated supplementary panel which may itself contain a further pictogram and line of text.

customPictogramCode.title: customPictogramCode
customPictogramCode.description: If a custom code list (not based on GDD) is being used, this is the code of the pictogram using the pictogram code list identified in the corresponding PictogramDisplayArea object

pictogramFlashing.title: pictogramFlashing
pictogramFlashing.description: Indication of whether the pictogram is flashing.

pictogramInInverseColour.title: pictogramInInverseColour
pictogramInInverseColour.description: The pictogram is displayed in inverse colour (i.e. the colours are the inverse of normal).

viennaConventionCompliant.title: viennaConventionCompliant
viennaConventionCompliant.description: Indicates that the displayed pictogram conforms with the Vienna Convention defined pictogram list as modified by "UNECE Consolidated Resolution on Road Signs and Signals".

pictogramInformationType.title: pictogramInformationType
pictogramInformationType.description: Allows characterising the type of of displayed information

PictogramDisplay.title: PictogramDisplay
PictogramDisplay.description: A display of a pictogram on one area on a VMS, potentially with associated supplemental information or instructions.

isPrimaryPictogram.title: isPrimaryPictogram
isPrimaryPictogram.description: Indicates if the given pictogram display area is considered as the primary pictogram (= True) or not (= False).

pictogramDisplayUrl.title: pictogramDisplayUrl
pictogramDisplayUrl.description: Reference to a URL from where an image of the displayed pictogram can be be obtained.

PictogramDisplayArea.title: PictogramDisplayArea
PictogramDisplayArea.description: Characteristics specific to a pictogram display area on the VMS.

pictogramCodeListIdentifier.title: pictogramCodeListIdentifier
pictogramCodeListIdentifier.description: Indicates which pictogram code list is referenced. This may be ISO 14823 or a custom list.

pictogramNumberOfColours.title: pictogramNumberOfColours
pictogramNumberOfColours.description: The number of colours the pictogram display area is capable of rendering.

PictogramEnum.title: PictogramEnum
PictogramEnum.description: Types of pictogram not currently covered by ISO 14823 Graphic Data Dictionary

PositionXAbsoluteEnum.title: PositionXAbsoluteEnum
PositionXAbsoluteEnum.description: Absolute horizontal positions of an item within an assigned space.

PositionXRelativeEnum.title: PositionXRelativeEnum
PositionXRelativeEnum.description: Relative horizontal positions of one item to another.

PositionYAbsoluteEnum.title: PositionYAbsoluteEnum
PositionYAbsoluteEnum.description: Absolute verticals positions of an item within an assigned space.

PositionYRelativeEnum.title: PositionYRelativeEnum
PositionYRelativeEnum.description: Relative vertical positions of one item to another.

RegularPictogram.title: RegularPictogram
RegularPictogram.description: A regular pictogram displayable on a VMS panel.

presenceOfRedTriangle.title: presenceOfRedTriangle
presenceOfRedTriangle.description: Indication of the presence of a red triangle around the pictogram, often used to indicate imminence, typically within 2 km, of signed danger.

SettingReasonEnum.title: SettingReasonEnum
SettingReasonEnum.description: Coded reasons why a message has been selected for display on the sign.

SupplementalPictogramEnum.title: SupplementalPictogramEnum
SupplementalPictogramEnum.description: Types of pictograms displayable in supplementary panels (normally below the main pictogram display which it qualifies).

SupplementaryInformationDisplay.title: SupplementaryInformationDisplay
SupplementaryInformationDisplay.description: A display of information or a regulatory instruction which is supplemental to the associated pictogram, comprising either an additional line of text or a pictogram or both.

SupplementaryPanelArea.title: SupplementaryPanelArea
SupplementaryPanelArea.description: Characteristics of a panel which can display details (sometimes regulatory in nature) that are supplementary to one pictogram, comprising an additional line of text or another pictogram.

supplementaryPictogramCodeListIdentifier.title: supplementaryPictogramCodeListIdentifier
supplementaryPictogramCodeListIdentifier.description: Indicates which supplementary pictogram code list is referenced. This may be ISO 14823 or a custom list.

relatedPictogramArea.title: relatedPictogramArea
relatedPictogramArea.description: The displayAreaIndex associated with the pictogram display area that this supplementary display area is designed to supplement.

SupplementaryPictogram.title: SupplementaryPictogram
SupplementaryPictogram.description: An additional pictogram that is displayed in the panel which is supplemental to the associated pictogram display.

pictogramDescription.title: pictogramDescription
pictogramDescription.description: Description of the displayed supplementary pictogram.

pictogramCode.title: pictogramCode
pictogramCode.description: The code of the supplementary pictogram from the supplementary pictogram code list referenced in the corresponding SupplementaryPanelArea.

pictogramUrl.title: pictogramUrl
pictogramUrl.description: Reference to a URL from where an image of the displayed supplementary pictogram can be be obtained.

additionalDescription.title: additionalDescription
additionalDescription.description: Additional free text description of the supplementary pictogram.

pictogramFlashing.title: pictogramFlashing
pictogramFlashing.description: Indication of whether the pictogram is flashing.

pictogramInformationType.title: pictogramInformationType
pictogramInformationType.description: Allows characterising the type of of displayed information

SupplementaryText.title: SupplementaryText
SupplementaryText.description: Text used in a supplementary display associated with a pictogram

textLine.title: textLine
textLine.description: One line of text displayed in the panel which is supplemental to the pictogram display.

TextDisplay.title: TextDisplay
TextDisplay.description: A page of text (comprising one or more ordered lines) that are displayed simultaneously on the VMS.

textCode.title: textCode
textCode.description: The code of the specific text, from the defined code list.

textImageUrl.title: textImageUrl
textImageUrl.description: Reference to a URL from where an image of the displayed text can be be obtained.

TextDisplayArea.title: TextDisplayArea
TextDisplayArea.description: Characteristics specific to the textual display area on the VMS.

proportionalFont.title: proportionalFont
proportionalFont.description: Whether the VMS supports proportional fonts

maxNumberOfCharacters.title: maxNumberOfCharacters
maxNumberOfCharacters.description: Maximum number of displayable characters on a single line in the textual display area of the VMS.

maxNumberOfRows.title: maxNumberOfRows
maxNumberOfRows.description: Maximum number of rows of displayable characters in the textual display area of the VMS.

textCodeListIdentifier.title: textCodeListIdentifier
textCodeListIdentifier.description: Indicates which textual message code list is referenced. This may be specific to the VMS type defined by vmsTypeCode.

TextLine.title: TextLine
TextLine.description: A single line of text displayed on a text display area or supplementary panel or corresponding to a displayed text. It may correspond to the entire text in the case that text segmentation in lines is not available.

textLine.title: textLine
textLine.description: A free-text string that is displayed on a single line on the text display area. It may correspond to the entire text in the case that text segmentation in lines is not available.

lineLanguage.title: lineLanguage
lineLanguage.description: The language of the displayed text, specified by an ISO 639-1 language code.

lineColour.title: lineColour
lineColour.description: The colour of the displayed text.

lineFlashing.title: lineFlashing
lineFlashing.description: Indication of whether the displayed text is flashing.

lineHtml.title: lineHtml
lineHtml.description: The displayed line of text defined by an HTML string showing text formatting tags.

isExactTextOnSign.title: isExactTextOnSign
isExactTextOnSign.description: Confirms whether the specified text is exactly as displayed, or whether it is just a semantic equivalent.

textInformationType.title: textInformationType
textInformationType.description: Allows characterising the type of of displayed information

UnitOfMeasureEnum.title: UnitOfMeasureEnum
UnitOfMeasureEnum.description: Identifies a unit of measure for a physical quantity

Vms.title: Vms
Vms.description: Variable message sign - a display panel used to display one or more messages (text, symbols, pictograms or combinations) that can be changed or switched on or off as required

lanternsPresent.title: lanternsPresent
lanternsPresent.description: Indicates whether the VMS is equipped with flashing lanterns outside the text or pictogram display areas

description.title: description
description.description: The description of the VMS (possibly giving a description of its location or its normal use).

owner.title: owner
owner.description: Owner (authority or organisation) of the VMS. This may not be the same as the authority or organisation which is currently controlling the VMS.

physicalSupport.title: physicalSupport
physicalSupport.description: Description of how the VMS is physically mounted or deployed on the road.

vmsType.title: vmsType
vmsType.description: Broad classification of the type of variable message sign.

vmsTypeCode.title: vmsTypeCode
vmsTypeCode.description: Specification of the type of VMS defined by a code, normally country or even manufacturer specific (e.g. MS4).

dynamicallyConfigurable.title: dynamicallyConfigurable
dynamicallyConfigurable.description: Identifies (when True) that the VMS has a display area that may be dynamically configured to display different combinations of text and pictogram areas. The current configuration will normally be given with each published current VMS setting.

displayHeight.title: displayHeight
displayHeight.description: Height in metres of the sign's overall display area.

displayWidth.title: displayWidth
displayWidth.description: Width in metres of the sign's overall display area.

heightAboveCarriageway.title: heightAboveCarriageway
heightAboveCarriageway.description: Height in metres of the mounted sign above the carriageway, measured to the bottom of the display area.

dedicatedUsage.title: dedicatedUsage
dedicatedUsage.description: Type of usage to which this VMS is dedicated

vmsLocation.title: vmsLocation
vmsLocation.description: The physical point location at which the variable message sign is situated. For mobile VMS which are regularly moved this need not be provided. Instead the VMS location should be provided in the VmsPublication along with current settings.

managedLogicalLocation.title: managedLogicalLocation
managedLogicalLocation.description: The logical location managed by the VMS

imageLink.title: imageLink
imageLink.description: A URL reference from where an image of the VMS can be obtained.

VmsConfiguration.title: VmsConfiguration
VmsConfiguration.description: Describes the current configuration and characteristics of a VMS, whether it is statically or dynamically configured.

numberOfDisplayAreas.title: numberOfDisplayAreas
numberOfDisplayAreas.description: Number of display areas which the VMS contains.

VmsController.title: VmsController
VmsController.description: A roadside unit which can control one or more variable message signs on a single gantry or mounting or on closely associated gantries or mountings.

numberOfVms.title: numberOfVms
numberOfVms.description: Number of variable message signs controlled by the unit.

externalIdentifier.title: externalIdentifier
externalIdentifier.description: Identification of a VMS controller unit used by the supplier or consumer systems.

ipAddress.title: ipAddress
ipAddress.description: IP network address of the VMS controller unit.

electronicAddress.title: electronicAddress
electronicAddress.description: Electronic address of the VMS controller unit (if not IP addressable).

VmsControllerFault.title: VmsControllerFault
VmsControllerFault.description: Details of the fault which is being reported for the specified variable message sign control unit.

vmsControllerFault.title: vmsControllerFault
vmsControllerFault.description: The type of fault which is being reported for the VMS unit.

VmsControllerFaultEnum.title: VmsControllerFaultEnum
VmsControllerFaultEnum.description: Types of variable message sign controller faults.

VmsControllerStatus.title: VmsControllerStatus
VmsControllerStatus.description: Status of a VMS controller unit

vmsControllerTableReference.title: vmsControllerTableReference
vmsControllerTableReference.description: A reference to a versioned VMS controller unit table.

vmsControllerReference.title: vmsControllerReference
vmsControllerReference.description: A reference to a versioned VMS controller record in a VMS controller table which defines the characteristics of the VMS controller unit.

statusUpdateTime.title: statusUpdateTime
statusUpdateTime.description: Time at which this VMS controller unit status was updated

informationManagerOverride.title: informationManagerOverride
informationManagerOverride.description: Organisation that manages the information content (is responsible for updates of this information) typically the organisation that first made the DATEX II publication of this content. This value overrides any value specified at a more general level.

VmsControllerTable.title: VmsControllerTable
VmsControllerTable.description: A versioned VMS controller unit table comprising a number of data records, each record defining the characteristics of a specific deployed variable message sign controller unit.

vmsControllerTableIdentification.title: vmsControllerTableIdentification
vmsControllerTableIdentification.description: An alphanumeric identification for the VMS controller unit table, possibly human readable.

informationManager.title: informationManager
informationManager.description: Organisation that manages the information content (is responsible for updates of this information) typically the organisation that first made the DATEX II publication of this content.

VmsFault.title: VmsFault
VmsFault.description: Details of the fault which is being reported for the specified variable message sign panel.

vmsFault.title: vmsFault
vmsFault.description: The type of fault which is being reported for the specified variable message sign panel.

VmsFaultEnum.title: VmsFaultEnum
VmsFaultEnum.description: Types of variable message sign faults.

VmsMessage.title: VmsMessage
VmsMessage.description: A message displayed on a VMS which can comprise one or more sequentially displayed text pages and/or pictograms with supplementary details.

associatedTrafficManagementPlan.title: associatedTrafficManagementPlan
associatedTrafficManagementPlan.description: The identification of the traffic management plan or diversion plan with which the message is associated.

messageSetBy.title: messageSetBy
messageSetBy.description: The organisation or authority which set the message currently being displayed.

setBySystem.title: setBySystem
setBySystem.description: Indicates whether the message has been set automatically by a system. True =  automatically set.

reasonForSetting.title: reasonForSetting
reasonForSetting.description: The reason why the sign has been set.

codedReasonForSetting.title: codedReasonForSetting
codedReasonForSetting.description: The reason, in terms of a high-level coded classification, why the sign has been set.

primarySetting.title: primarySetting
primarySetting.description: Identifies whether the message setting is primary (explicitly requested) or is secondary (derived according to an algorithm as the result of setting other signs). True = a primary setting.

mareNostrumCompliant.title: mareNostrumCompliant
mareNostrumCompliant.description: Indication that the displayed message (text and pictogram) conforms with the formulation recommended by the Mare Nostrum project.

timeLastSet.title: timeLastSet
timeLastSet.description: The date/time at which the sign was last set.

requestedBy.title: requestedBy
requestedBy.description: The authority, organisation or system which requested the setting of the message. This may be different from the authority or system which actually set the message on behalf of the requestor.

relatedSituation.title: relatedSituation
relatedSituation.description: A reference to the managed situation to which the set message relates.

relatedSituationRecord.title: relatedSituationRecord
relatedSituationRecord.description: A reference to the situation record within a managed situation to which the set message relates.

distanceFromClosestSituationRecord.title: distanceFromClosestSituationRecord
distanceFromClosestSituationRecord.description: Distance of the VMS from the location of the closest situation record. If the VMS is located within the extent of the situation record this should be set to zero.

sequencingInterval.title: sequencingInterval
sequencingInterval.description: The time duration that each text page or pictogram within a message is displayed for before the VMS displays the next text page and/or pictogram in the message.

VmsPublication.title: VmsPublication
VmsPublication.description: A publication containing the current status and settings of one or more VMS controller units, each unit controlling one or more individual variable message signs.

VmsStatus.title: VmsStatus
VmsStatus.description: Provides the current status and settings of the VMS and the currently displayed information.

flashingLightsOn.title: flashingLightsOn
flashingLightsOn.description: Indicates if lights outside display areas (called lanterns in some countries) are turned on.

remainingPowerCapacity.title: remainingPowerCapacity
remainingPowerCapacity.description: The estimated length of time for which the VMS will have power to continue operating

statusUpdateTime.title: statusUpdateTime
statusUpdateTime.description: Time at which this VMS status was updated

sequencingInterval.title: sequencingInterval
sequencingInterval.description: The time duration that each message is displayed for before the VMS displays the next message in the sequence.

workingStatus.title: workingStatus
workingStatus.description: Indicates whether the VMS is usable. Note it can still be usable with minor faults.

vmsLocationOverride.title: vmsLocationOverride
vmsLocationOverride.description: The current physical point location at which the VMS is situated. This overrides any physical location stated in the corresponding Vms object. Typically it is used for giving the updated physical location of a mobile VMS which has recently been moved.

managedLogicalLocationOverride.title: managedLogicalLocationOverride
managedLogicalLocationOverride.description: The current logical location that is being managed by the VMS which overrides any stated in the corresponding Vms object. Typically it is used for giving the updated managed location of a mobile VMS which has recently been moved.

VmsTablePublication.title: VmsTablePublication
VmsTablePublication.description: A publication containing one or more VMS controller unit tables each comprising a set of records which hold details of VMS controller units.

WorkingStatusEnum.title: WorkingStatusEnum
WorkingStatusEnum.description: Identifies the working status of a VMS.
